sentence.Network_en: The motive of the executions would be to instil fear.
sentence.Network_cn: 执行死刑的动机是要灌输恐惧。

sentence.Network_en: They hope that their work will instil a sense of responsibility in children.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们希望自己的工作能够逐步培养起孩子们的一种责任感。

sentence.Network_en: It's necessary to instil the minds of the youth with lofty ideals.
sentence.Network_cn: 把崇高理想灌输到年青人的思想中去是很必要的.

list.abs: Steven_新浪博客 ... 8. impart knowledge 传授知识 9. instill values 灌输价值观 1. parenting n. 家长给小孩的教育.
其他治疗方式如膀胱内灌注(intravesical instillation)，由膀胱内直接灌注药物如Capsaicin、Resiniferatoxin(RTX)或肌肉松弛剂，以减.
instillation 滴注法，灌注instillation catheter 滴药导管instillator 滴注器
intraocular pressure 眼压intravenous instillation 输液inulin 菊糖

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from Latin instillare, from in- 'into' + stillare 'to drop' (from stilla 'a drop')

entry.def: If you instil an idea or feeling in someone, especially over a period of time, you make them think it or feel it.

example.ex: They hope that their work will instil a sense of responsibility in children...
example.tran: 他们希望自己的工作能够逐步培养起孩子们的一种责任感。

example.ex: The motive of the executions would be to instil fear.
example.tran: 执行死刑的动机是要灌输恐惧。

auth_sentence.content: I...could easily instil my own confidence into those seeking my help.
auth_sentence.res_content: I...could easily instil my own confidence into those seeking my help.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I...could easily instil my own confidence into those seeking my help.

auth_sentence.content: It just uses bogey-men to instil fear and have its way.
auth_sentence.res_content: It just uses bogey-men to instil fear and have its way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It just uses bogey-men to instil fear and have its way.

auth_sentence.content: We have to instil in them a work ethic tied to a reward system.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have to instil in them a work ethic tied to a reward system.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have to instil in them a work ethic tied to a reward system.

means.word_mean: 逐渐使某人获得(某种可取的品质);逐步灌输，养成（习惯）。

sentences.en: I consider it important to instil a pride in the players.
sentences.cn: 我认为使运动员逐步感到自豪是很重要的。

sentences.en: Fast food is generally not a good way to instil good eating habits in your child.
sentences.cn: 对于帮助你的孩子养成好的饮食习惯，快餐绝对不是个好方法。
